timeline.bodyText: Agree to limit usage of nose for future pytest migration. I think the usage here is the same as TestCase.skipTest, can we directly use the this standard library?
timeline.author: markflyhigh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -146,6 +144,7 @@ def _parse_test_option_args(self, argv):
     known, unused_argv = parser.parse_known_args(argv)
 
     if self.is_integration_test and not known.test_pipeline_options:
+      from nose.plugins.skip import SkipTest

timeline.message: Switch to unittest.SkipTest instead of using nose.
Switch to unittest.SkipTest instead of using nose.
